LanguageData.TG_SilverStockOrbitalTooltip: Allows to adjust the total amount of silver that orbital traders will have in stock when they arrive. Orbital traders which were already in range when the setting is changed will not be affected.
LanguageData.TG_SilverStockSettlementTooltip: Allows to adjust the total amount of silver that settlements will have in stock. Changes will only apply when settlements restock.
LanguageData.TG_SilverStockCaravanTooltip: Allows to adjust the total amount of silver that caravans will have in stock when they arrive. Caravans which were already in the map when the setting is changed will not be affected.
LanguageData.TG_SilverStockVisitorTooltip: Allows to adjust the total amount of silver that visitors will have in stock when they arrive. Visitors which were already in the map when the setting is changed will not be affected.
LanguageData.TG_SellPsylinkNeuroformersTooltip: Allows traders to have psylink neuroformers in stock.
LanguageData.TG_ResetSettingsTooltip: Reset all options of the mod to their default values.
LanguageData.TG_DevelopmentOptionsTooltip: These options are meant for development and bug reporting, and should not have any in-game effects.
LanguageData.TG_LogTraderGenTooltip: Show a detailed report of the generation process of traders in the log.
LanguageData.TG_LogTraderStockGenTooltip: Include stock generator information when Log trader generation is enabled.
